item.description:
*** 6/9 2pm update - Practice still on. BBQ still on. Weather looks to be clearing a bit. If the weather turns worse, the BBQ will begin earlier***

NHC Softball Team will be holding a practice/ pickup game on Saturday, June, 9, 2007, at 3pm at Bayview Park, 99 Hallock Ave, New Haven, CT. Field time is very hard to get on weekends in the summer. And everyone can use some practice!

After last game's performance, NHC Softball Team members are strongly encouraged to attend.

Other Softball team members are joining the practice as well.

If you are interested in just playing softball or getting some exercise, you are welcome as well.

Post practice BBQ at location very near field.

Contact is Doug 203-305-5282

Directions:

95 south to exit 45, sharp left to RT10/ Ella Grasso Blvd, continue to Sea St. Left at Hallock.

or takeSargent drive south to left on Howard ave, left on 6th st to Hallock Ave.
item.name: NEW LOCATION: SOFTBALL PRACTICE/PICKUP GAME
